params.name: filePath
params.description: Enter the file path where you want to create the CSV file. All directories should be present.

params.name: headers
params.description: When adding the headers, separate them with a new line or pass an array of strings in JSON format. Each header represents a column in the CSV file.

params.name: data
params.description: When entering the data, separate the values with a new line (only one row), or pass a nested array of strings in JSON format, where each array represents a row in the CSV file.

params.name: filePath
params.description: Path to the file where it needs to be created, all directories should be present

params.name: headers
params.description: Separate the headers with new line, or pass an array of strings(could be JSON). CSV file will have this amount of columns.

params.name: data
params.description: Separate the values with new line(only one row), or pass nested array of strings(could be JSON), where each array represents a row.
